metadata.synopsis: Music producer Sam (Leslie Cheung) has made a pop superstar out of his girlfriend, Rose (Carina Liu). After a fight, Sam decides to prove he can create a new male musician as popular as Rose. When he holds open auditions, Wing (Anita Yuen), who admires both Rose and Sam and is determined to meet her idols, disguises herself as a man -- and is selected as the winner. Wing moves in with the fractious couple to begin her training and, despite her innocent intentions, soon grows attracted to Sam.
